title: Apparently social norms includes....
body:
Women in see through clothing. 

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CERf50pWgAAW05m.jpg:large

Riot, you'll post this to your own twitter but you treat us like we're children? I get not allowing L-word stuff because it's disgusting but you are cracking down too hard. I'd tell you to inform your mod's to have better standards, but it must be hard when they aren't even in the same building as you. 

:^)

Also.... What's this I hear about third party mods... moderating our forums? 

Might want some more transparency there, Riot. 

EDIT:

Got more info boys! This is who Riot employs to moderate our forums!

http://metaversemodsquad.com/
